findings.title: B01: owner can renounce ownership
findings.description: The `owner` can call `renounceOwnership`, which leaves the contract without an owner, thus removing any functionality that is available only to the `owner`.

findings.title: B02: Input validation for valid addresses is missing
findings.description: The GalacticGateway constructor and set functions (setAdmin, setController, setDownstream, and setDestructor) do not validate that the new addresses with privileged roles are valid.

findings.title: B03: canTransact modifier can be optimized
findings.description: The canTransact modifier can be optimized by checking if the downstream address is different than 0 in the GalacticGateway constructor and setDownstream function.
